title: Xatab has passed away
body:
I didn’t want to believe the news I’ve received today, but multiple sources confirmed that one of the most respected repackers in the world, Xatab, has passed away. He was fighting with a very serious ill for a long time, but…

I have no words. I was in contact with Xatab almost since I began my repacking way. He was a very kind hearted old man, who was helping millions people around the world. And now he’s gone forever.

Rest in peace, dear Xatab, rest in peace.

If you feel some gratitude to the man and want to support his family in that dark moment, please do so. Here’s Xatab’s Donation Alerts page, it supports traditional donations methods like PayPal and such, so no problems with crypto.
